desnightowl.message: En klik lahko pretvori stran v nočni način z preprosto hiperpovezavo. Kliknite znova, da se vrnete v navadni pogled. Kliknite gumb svetilke, če želite onemogočiti to funkcijo.

desscreenprotection.message: En klik zatemni stran v prijetno oranžno barvo, in s tem zmanjša obremenitev vaših oči, na vseh zavihkih. Kliknite gumb svetilke, da onemogočite to funkcijo.

resetlampanalytic.message: Reset your Turn Off the Lights Analytics Data

charttitletotaltime.message: Total time the dark layer is active (minutes)

charttitleavgday.message: Average daily schedule (when the lights turn off frequently)

titlelanalyticprivacy.message: Turn Off the Lights browser extension takes your privacy very seriously. The Turn Off the Lights Analytics you are seeing on this page is only stored locally on your computer. Your personal site engagement information will not be sold and not transferred to unaffiliated third parties.

shareanalyticlove.message: The website I most love is $websiteurl$ with Turn Off the Lights

desvolumeposa.message: Show the volume meter in center of the current video player

desvolumeposb.message: Show the volume value on top left of the current video player

desvolumeposc.message: Show the volume value on top right of the current video player

desvideovolumhold.message: Hold down the left or right mouse button, and move your mouse to change the volume

desvideovolumalt.message: Only if the alt key is pressed

functionactive.message: This function is activated when you click on a tab, or when you refresh the web page. However, this function stops automatically after 15 seconds.

desmultiopacitynormal.message: All websites have the same opacity value

desmultiopacitysel.message: The below websites have the selected opacities

desmultiopacitynot.message: If a website is not in the list, the default opacity value will apply.

desatmossolidcolor.message: Choose your one solid glow effect color

desremrate.message: If you like Turn Off the Lights™, please do not hesitate to rate this extension to five stars now. This gives us courage to continue to maintain and improve this product for you. Writing a review is recommended, but not mandatory. If you do not have the time to write a review, you can rate it anonymously. It is important to give it ★★★★★. Thank you!

titelintroduce.message: Introducing the new Turn Off the Lights!

desintroduce.message: All the features you're used to, with a brand new look and feel, and personalized to you.

econothingthisyear.message: Nothing this year. Keeps the lights off to save energy

ecotoastermaking.message: Toaster making two loaves of toast

ecobrewsomecoffee.message: Brew some Coffee, brewing one pot of coffee

ecoblowdrying.message: Blow-drying your hair for 10 minutes uses approximately

ecowashingclothes.message: Washing your clothes in a cold-rinse cycle uses approximately

ecorunningdishwasher.message: Running your dishwasher in energy-saver mode will use

ecokeepfridgeday.message: Keep the Fridge Running for a day

ecoloadlaundry.message: One load of laundry in the dryer

ecoheatingtenshower.message: Heating enough water for a 10-minute shower

ecotwentyfourghome.message: Enough to run Google Home for 24h

ecochargeteslacar.message: Charge your Tesla car for 20 miles

ecochargeteslacarhundred.message: Charge your Tesla electric vehicle to 100%

ecochargeteslathreetimes.message: Charge 3 times your Tesla electric vehicle to 100%

ecopowernwymonth.message: Enough electric energy for 1 month in New York

ecopowercamonth.message: Enough electric energy for 1 month in California

ecoplanetearth.message: Ready to save the planet Earth

autostopblocked.message: Blocked by Turn Off the Lights™ - www.turnoffthelights.com

autostopclickme.message: Click on me to play this HTML5 video

scoregame.message: My amazing high score $scorevalue$ on the HIDDEN easter egg game in the Turn Off the Lights Browser extension. Try it yourself!

permissionoption.message: Permission must be enabled to use this feature.

wpermissionnotremoved.message: The permissions have already been removed

desnightmodegesture.message: Make the page go dark or light by long-pressing the current web page

permissionactivetab.message: This will only dim the web page on the currently open tab page.

permissiontabs.message: This is needed for the following features: to show you the welcome and guide page, detect the current playing HTML5 video, take a screenshot of the HTML5 video, and to open the Options page.

permissioncontextmenu.message: This is to add the "Darken this page" menu item in the web browser context menu.

permissionstorage.message: This is to save the settings on your local computer, and to sync it to your web browser account.

permissionallurl.message: This is to control the lamp button on all websites that include http, https, file, and ftp.

permissiontheme.message: This is to change the web browser user interface in a dark or light theme.

permissionscripting.message: This is to inject JavaScript and CSS code into websites.

permissionalarms.message: This is to schedule code execution, either periodically or at a specific time in the future.

desnightmodeswitchhide.message: Automatically hide the night switch after your chosen seconds

desatmosfpsauto.message: Synchronized as a best effort with the frame rate of the video playing on screen

desvideovolumeonly.message: Activate the Mouse Volume Scroll only on the following site(s):

desvolumescrolla.message: Automatically adjust the scroll direction depending on the current operating system

desvolumeposd.message: Show the volume meter on top left of the current video player

desvolumepose.message: Show the volume meter on top right of the current video player

despip.message: The Picture-in-Picture allows you to create a floating video window that is always on top of other windows.

titelpiperror.message: No video found on the current web page. Try a different web page.

desscrolltip.message: You can scroll inside the top navigation bar and the color bars. When you scroll horizontally, you can see more buttons in this bar.

titleyoutube.message: Join Turn Off the Lights Channel.

desyoutube.message: Uncover the power of the Turn Off the Lights browser extension. Watch it now on YouTube.

desgamepad.message: Control the multimedia with your game controller

desnightmodeos.message: Automatically switch the current web page to Night Mode if the OS appearance is set to Dark

permissionwebnav.message: This is to add the Night Mode immediately before the web page loads.

desratebad.message: Sorry you have had this bad experience. Please let us know on how we can improve our extension for you.

desrategood.message: Happy to hear that you love Turn Off the Lights! Will you take a moment to rate us in the browser extension store? Your browser extension store reviews make a difference!

desratetitle.message: Do you love this browser extension?

desratebadtitle.message: How can we make it better?

destapstar.message: Tap a star to rate it on the browser extension store.

gamecontrollerstep1description.message: Connect your Game Controller to your device via USB or Bluetooth.

gamecontrollerstep3description.message: Open any web page, and press any button to activate the Game Controller.
